label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_030
content:
## 2024-09-23 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 87
- Active: 74
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 61
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 13

#### By Cohort
- 10mg: 20
- 25mg: 21
- 50mg: 23
- 100mg: 23

- KIM-1 (ng/mL) SD: 0.49
- NGAL (ng/mL) Mean: 41.7
- NGAL (ng/mL) SD: 13.9

### Dose Response
- KIM-1 Dose Correlation (r): 0.634
- NGAL Dose Correlation (r): 0.386
- eGFR Dose Correlation (r): -0.488
- UACR Dose Correlation (r): 0.364

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.5
- Hematocrit (%) Mean: 41.4
- Hematocrit (%) SD: 2.4
- WBC (K/µL) Mean: 7.6
- WBC (K/µL) SD: 1.0

- Platelets (K/µL) SD: 48

- Sodium (mEq/L) SD: 2.7

- Bicarbonate (mEq/L) SD: 2.1

- Phosphorus (mg/dL) SD: 0.4

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-3030, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: false, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-3061, Description: hyperkalemia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 10mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-3022, Description: Urine sample collection outside 24h window, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: RB-PD-3033, Description: Blood pressure measurement not recorded at visit, Severity: minor

### Events
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core
- Protocol training refresher completed for site coordinators
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory

### Notes
- Week 30: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 87 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
